relation: The down town Norfolk area is full and activities The school is near VA Beach.
Do your research, make sure this is the school for you.
Norfolk State is a major focused school. They are very concerned with educating their students. NSU is a family.
pageTitle: Norfolk State University (NSU) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {405511=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 175383=Brown hall is the oldest building on campus, has been here since about 1935., 145354=Athletic- Basketball, Baseball, Football, Bowling, Tennis, etc. (NSU held 5 MEAC titles in 2011-2012), 30719=i like the pass and review that the marching band does during the home games. although they play a lot of old school music, their marching style differs from other schools because they march military style and this is refreshing from other college bands. i wish they could get enough votes to attend the honda battle of the college bands so people in other areas can see them., 342182=Depends on where and when you go. Everything revolves and around meal plan, which happens three times a day: 730-930, 11-130, and 430 - 730 during the weekday, and 1030-130 and 430-630 on the weekends. You have the big cafÃ© and small cafÃ© (close from Friday evening -sun), the small cafÃ©, the student center (chic-fil-a, tropical smoothie, and pizza hut), Spartan Station (burgers, burritos, and subs) and the Bodega which doesn't have meal plan, but is perfect for late night dining when you have dining dollars have Spartan bucks. After awhile it gets old and you'll be begging your parents for money to eat off campus.}

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot I am in the Nursing associate degree program right now. It is a tough program, but is defiantly worth it. You get action first semester when you have your clinical at Nursing Homes. Login to rate or flag the reviews Shakyra from Norfolk , VA 12/13/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 11 out of 11 people found this review useful. 2 of 103 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Norfolk State University is great for students who want to get a headstart in the world. This institution breeds leaders and develops positive, hard-working, contributing members of society. NSU is known for its excellent Nursing Program and its nationally renowned Music Program. This university is for students who want to learn in a well-rounded, student-friendly, family-oriented environment. It is great for students who stand out amongst their peers and would like to continue making their mark on the world. Tips for prospective students My biggest suggestion for new freshmen
